name: CLAMP Style LoRA
description:
CLAMP style LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕

Legendary mangaka group/circle. I tried to capture a variety of their artstyles over the years.
I tested it on AnyLoRA ckpt at weight 1-1.2 with trigger clamp \(circle\). It should also understand substyles such as chobits. You can also add watercolor, 1990s \(style\), retro artstyle.

How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight (by default it's :1)

meta.prompt: clamp \(circle\)<lora:clamp__circle__offset:1.2>  , masterpiece, watercolor, 1990s \(style\), 1girl, :d, antenna hair, brown hair, cherry blossoms, choker, closed mouth, dress, female, flower, formal, frilled dress, frills, green eyes, hair flower, hair ornament,  jacket, long sleeves, looking at viewer, magical girl, mini wings, open mouth, petals, pink choker, puffy short sleeves, puffy sleeves, retro artstyle, short hair, short sleeves, smile, tree, white dress, white wings, wind
meta.negativePrompt: (painting by bad-artist-anime:0.9), (painting by bad-artist:0.9), negative_hand, watermark, text, error, blurry, jpeg artifacts, cropped, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, artist name, (worst quality, low quality:1.4), bad anatomy
